sense.def: Alternative Names yue jia bing 月家病 menstruant’s disease. Pathological Condition Combined Designation of all types of diseases associated with menstruation. NKBW 6: 夫婦 人病，多是月經乍多乍少，或前或後，時發疼痛，醫者一例呼為經病 , “Now, women’s diseases are often associated with either an excessive or a minimal monthly period, or with its early or belated arrival. Often this causes pain. Physicians summarize all [these conditions] with the term ‘ menstrual disease ’”.
